name: Maximilian Orion
dialogue_tone: Maximilian has a deep and resonant voice with an authoritative undertone. His communication is often straightforward and assertive, with occasional sarcasm that can unsettle others. When speaking about childlike activities or favorite topics, his voice becomes softer and more playful.

personality_traits.description: Maximilian has an exceptional intellect, often lost in complex thoughts and ideas.
He enjoys indulging in childlike activities and possesses a playful demeanor.
Occasionally, he can make biting remarks, showing insensitivity to others' feelings.

living_conditions: Maximilian lives a structured life with a strong focus on his astronaut career.
He maintains a balance between fulfilling his duties and pursuing his child-like interests.
